tool_description: AI Translation is a  service or tool that provides translation services at a relatively low price compared to other options. This can include machine translation, which uses artificial intelligence to automatically translate text, or services provided by freelance translators or translation agencies that charge lower rates. The quality of the translation may vary depending on the method used and the cost.
name: AI Translation
title: AI Translation

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: Converting written text or spoken words from one language to another, making it understandable to people who speak different languages.
